mapper.insert: insert into userInfo (userID, userPW, userName, userAddress, userTel, userBirth, caneId) values (#{userID},#{userPW},#{userName},#{userAddress},#{userTel},#{userBirth},#{caneId})
insert into userReport (userId, userReportPlace, userReportContent,userReportState) values (#{userID},#{userReportPlace},#{userReportContent},#{userReportState})
insert into blindCall (userId, blindCallDestination, blindCallDate) values (#{userId},#{blindCallDestination}, #{blindCallDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE userInfo SET userPW = #{userPW}, userName = #{userName}, userAddress = #{userAddress}, userTel = #{userTel}, userBirth = #{userBirth}, caneId = #{caneId} WHERE userID = #{userID}
